channel.title: Mopar Quiz - Re-Made in Visual Basics '08 [Take a Look]
channel.description:
Alright, as most of you know, you've heard of the Mopar Quiz. You need to pass it when you first begin to start on the forums. Well, this past hour, I took the Mopar Quiz questions and answers, and I have made my own little Mopar Quiz :) It has fully working sounds, a nice theme, and it's fun to do :) Well, after a couple times it's not, but hey, first time it is. Please do not flame me, as I spent a decent amount on this. Pictures below:
Download link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?1zj0qdzyocm]http://www.mediafire.com/?1zj0qdzyocm[/url]
First Question: [img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/5597/14174019.png[/img] What happens if you get a Question wrong: [img]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/6469/wrongq1.png[/img]
This does not contain any viruses, if you don't believe me, Media Fire scans for any viruses, so you're safe. Also after you've taken the quiz, please give me feedback and how I can improve my future programs. It is my first project in Visual Basics '08
Credits: Me and Moparisthebest or whoever made the Quiz.

Aww… it’s gone… Oh well, but yeh, thanks for positive comments so far guys

item.title: Mopar Quiz - Re-Made in Visual Basics '08 [Take a Look]
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

_ikram:

Great, great and great but the question is why?

Well, I had alot of ideas for VB '08, but I said, “Why not a quiz” and since I went on Mopar quite a lot, I figured why not make a quiz So I spent awhile on it, was orginally one huge page, but then when I tested, you could only choose 1 out of like 60 bullets, so I had to cut each question to each box.

Read full topic
